description: Try our easy to follow Poached Salmon & Asparagus recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fish dishes,High protein,Low salt,Quick & easy lunch,Asparagus,Potato,Salmon
name: Poached Salmon & Asparagus Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g Woolworths Cook baby herb & butter potatoes, cooked (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Place stock, wine, onion and bay leaves, into a large, deep frying pan. Season with salt and pepper. Place over medium heat and bring to a gentle simmer.
Add salmon, skin side down. Cover with lid and turn heat to low for 10 minutes.
Add asparagus, cover and cook for a further 5 minutes until asparagus is tender and salmon is cooked through. Heat hollandaise sauce following pack instructions.
Remove asparagus and salmon from pan with a slotted spoon. Drain on paper towel. Divide between serving plates. Spoon over hollandaise sauce and serve with potatoes and lemon.
